message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it provides significant value at this price point, especially considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $13,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $13,000.  Could we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I see, Alice. I'll try to accommodate your position. How about if I offer $13,200 for the product?
